tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE purchases (
    purchase_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    product_name VARCHAR(100),
    price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    purchase_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE personalized_emails (
    email_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    template_id INT,
    email_content TEXT,
    sent_date TIMESTAMP
);
